	<meta property="og:description" content="When handling an incident, FortiGuard Labs security researchers noticed that Trickbot had begun to deploy Conti and Diavol ransomware in the same attack. According to the researchers, Conti and Diavol had striking similarities including: &#8220;The two ransomware families&#8217;… use of asynchronous I/O operations for file encryption queuing to using virtually identical command-line parameters for the [&hellip;]" />

    <body class="threat_watch-template-default single single-threat_watch postid-8430 wp-embed-responsive metaslider-plugin wpb-js-composer js-comp-ver-8.0.1 vc_responsive" id="top">

        <script> 

            (function () { 

        var zi = document.createElement('script'); 

        zi.type = 'text/javascript'; 

        zi.async = true; 

        zi.referrerPolicy = 'unsafe-url'; 

        zi.src = 'https://ws.zoominfo.com/pixel/617acfaa3b80e6001287d1b7'; 

        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; 

        s.parentNode.insertBefore(zi, s); 

      })(); 

        </script>

<li id="menu-item-10079770" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current_page_parent menu-item-10079770"role="menuitem"data-depth="0"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/blog/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Blog</span></span></span></a></li>
</ul>                            </nav>
                                                            </div>
                <div class="site-header__secondary-menu">
                                                                        <nav class="secondary-menu shared-walker-menu" aria-label="Secondary Menu">

</ul>                            </nav>

	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-10079773"role="menuitem"data-depth="1" data-parent="2914"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/about-us/press-releases/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Press Releases</span></span></span></a></li>
	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-5252"role="menuitem"data-depth="1" data-parent="2914"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/about-us/in-the-news/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">In the News</span></span></span></a></li>
	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-10080606"role="menuitem"data-depth="1" data-parent="2914"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/browns/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Cleveland Browns</span></span></span></a></li>
	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-10081504"role="menuitem"data-depth="1" data-parent="2914"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/michael-kim/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Michael Kim</span></span></span></a></li>
	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-10079774"role="menuitem"data-depth="1" data-parent="2914"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/about-us/events/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Events</span></span></span></a></li>
	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-2915"role="menuitem"data-depth="1" data-parent="2914"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/about-us/careers/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Careers</span><span class="menu-item__badge" data-color="bright-blue">We're Hiring</span></span></span></a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current_page_parent menu-item-10079770"role="menuitem"data-depth="0"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/blog/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Blog</span></span></span></a></li>

                    </div>

        <div class="off-canvas__bottom">

    <nav class="social-media-menu" aria-label="Social Media Menu">

                <div id="primary" class="wrap">
                    <main id="main" class="site-main">

    <header  class="entry-header">
        <div class="entry-header__wrap">
            <div class="entry-header__content">
                                <h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">New Ransomware “Diavol” Being Dropped by Trickbot</h1>                                                                <div class="post_date"></div>                                <p class="byline">By </p>                
            <nav class="social-share-menu" aria-label="Social Share Menu" data-style="default">
        <ul class="menu" role="menu">
                            <li class="share-url-linkedin" role="menuitem">
                    <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/threat-watch/new-ransomware-diavol-being-dropped-by-trickbot/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank" title="Share this" aria-label="Share this">
                        <span class="screen-reader-text">Share this</span>
                        <i class="fa-brands fa-linkedin-in" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    </a>
                </li>
                            <li class="share-url-facebook" role="menuitem">
                    <a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/threat-watch/new-ransomware-diavol-being-dropped-by-trickbot/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank" title="Share this" aria-label="Share this">
                        <span class="screen-reader-text">Share this</span>
                        <i class="fa-brands fa-facebook" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    </a>
                </li>
                            <li class="share-url-twitter" role="menuitem">
                    <a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/threat-watch/new-ransomware-diavol-being-dropped-by-trickbot/&text=New+Ransomware+%E2%80%9CDiavol%E2%80%9D+Being+Dropped+by+Trickbot" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank" title="Tweet this" aria-label="Tweet this">
                        <span class="screen-reader-text">Tweet this</span>
                        <i class="fa-brands fa-twitter" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    </a>
                </li>
                            <li class="share-url-pinterest" role="menuitem">
                    <a href="https://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/threat-watch/new-ransomware-diavol-being-dropped-by-trickbot/&description=New+Ransomware+%E2%80%9CDiavol%E2%80%9D+Being+Dropped+by+Trickbot" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank" title="Pin this" aria-label="Pin this">
                        <span class="screen-reader-text">Pin this</span>
                        <i class="fa-brands fa-pinterest-p" role="presentation" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    </a>
                </li>
                    </ul>
    </nav>
                                                            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="entry-breadcrumbs"><p id="breadcrumbs"><span><span><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/">Home</a></span> » <span><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources">Resources</a></span> » <span><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/threat-watch/">Threat Watch</a></span> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page"><strong>New Ransomware “Diavol” Being Dropped by Trickbot</strong></span></span></p></div>        <div class="entry-header__overlay has-320deg-bright-blue-to-dark-gray-grid-background-pattern"></div>
    </header>

<div class="post-row">
    <div class="post-col">
        <article class="post-8430 threat_watch type-threat_watch status-publish hentry category-threat-watch" id="post-8430">
            <div class="entry-content">
                
<p>When handling an incident, FortiGuard Labs security researchers noticed that Trickbot had begun to deploy Conti and Diavol ransomware in the same attack. According to the researchers, Conti and Diavol had striking similarities including:</p>



<p>&#8220;The two ransomware families&#8217;… use of asynchronous I/O operations for file encryption queuing to using virtually identical command-line parameters for the same functionality (i.e., logging, drives and network shares encryption, network scanning).&#8221;</p>



<p>Despite the similarities, there is <strong>no direct connection</strong> that the Trickbot gang developed Diavol like Conti and Ryuk. Because Trickbot is used for access as a service for ransomware gangs it is affiliated with, the connection between Diavol and the Trickbot gang cannot be assumed, but from a practical defense perspective, organizations should continue to focus efforts on detecting Trickbot, Cobalt Strike, and domain profiling reconnaissance methods used prior to ransomware deployment.</p>
<h2>Analyst Notes</h2><p>This is not the first time that multiple ransomware families have been deployed at the same time. Getting ahead on what comes before ransomware is the best way to stop it. Studying reports by the folks at DFIR Report is an excellent way of understanding what commands are performed, what connections are made, and how the dropping malware moves across a system. Incorporating those lessons into detections will only be as valuable as the logs present and the continuous monitoring alongside it. Layering detections on top of good practices like centralized logging and continuous monitoring is one of the most effective ways to get started in defending an organization&#8217;s enterprise.</p>
<p>https://www.fortinet.com/blog/threat-research/diavol-new-ransomware-used-by-wizard-spider<br />
https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/trickbot-cybercrime-group-linked-to-new-diavol-ransomware/</p>
<a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/threat-watch/#subscribe-to-threat-watch" class="threat-watch-banner"><img src="https://www.binarydefense.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/threat-watch-cta.png" alt="" /></a>            </div> <!-- @end .entry-content -->
            
        </article> <!-- @end #post-8430 -->

        
    </div>
    </div>

                                                                <div class="footer-widgets__col">
                                                    <aside class="footer-area-menus">
                                <div class="widget widget_walker_menu">
                                    <h2 class="widget__title ">
                                        Resources                                    </h2>
                                    <nav class="footer-area-walker-menu shared-walker-menu" aria-label="Footer Area 2 Menu">
                                        <ul id="footer-area-2-menu" class="menu" role="menu"><li id="menu-item-2994" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current_page_parent menu-item-2994"role="menuitem"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/blog/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Blog</span></span></span></a></li>
<li id="menu-item-2996" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-case_study menu-item-2996"role="menuitem"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/case-studies/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Case Studies</span></span></span></a></li>
<li id="menu-item-2997" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-infographic menu-item-2997"role="menuitem"><a href="https://www.binarydefense.com/resources/data-sheets-and-infographics/" class="menu-item__link"><span class="menu-item__label"><span class="menu-item__content"><span class="menu-item__text">Data Sheets &#038; Infographics</span></span></span></a></li>

</ul>                                    </nav>
                                </div>
                            </aside>
                                                
                    </div>
